text: avarkal ettakaiyor enral allah(vin tiru namam) kurapperral, avarkalutaiya itayankal accattal natunkum; anriyum tankalukku erpatum tunpankalaip porumaiyutan cakittuk kolvorakavum, tolukaiyaic carivarak kataippitipporakavum, nam avarkalukku alittavarriliruntu (iravainin pataiyil) celavu ceyvorakavum irupparkla
